ComicInfo.Summary: The Big Picture Part One: More Than a Handful: Jen and John Jameson go on their first date. Then Jen (as She-Hulk) and Holden go to the Big House, a prison created by Hank Pym, where the inmates are shrunk to a very small size. They seek to legally liberate Southpaw, a young girl who is very important to Holden. And the tiny prisoners stage a jailbreak, but no one notices.
ComicInfo.Title: The Big Picture Part One: More Than a Handful
